sentences.sContent: Aspirin should be avoided if you have a stomach (peptic) ulcer, haemophilia or other bleeding disorder, or an allergy to aspirin or to other non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAID).
sentences.sContent_eng: Aspirin should be avoided if you have a stomach (peptic) ulcer, haemophilia or other bleeding disorder, or an allergy to aspirin or to other non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAID).
sentences.sCn: 如果你有胃（消化道）溃疡，血友病或者其它出血性疾病，或对阿司匹林或其他非甾体抗炎药过敏（类固醇消炎药），应避免服用阿司匹林。

trans.tranOther: a serious disease that prevents a person’s blood from becoming thick, so that they lose a lot of blood easily if they are injured
